paragraph.heading: 1EiffelStudio Editor Introduction
paragraph.paragraph: EiffelStudio includes an editor which allows you to read and modify the text of Eiffel classes.

It offers usual
./30_clipboard_functionality.xml clipboard ,
./40_history_functionality.xml history and
./50_search_functionality.xml search facilities. More advanced, class text specific functionality is also available. Its description can be found in "
60_autocomplete/00_introduction.xml Auto-complete " and "
70_on_blocks_functions/00_introduction.xml Operations on text blocks " sections.
